00021     public partial class workerView_AddToPrintRun : System.Web.UI.Page

00023         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00024         {
00025             //check that user has access
00026             //if not -> redirect to home page
00027             if (Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID] == null || !Security.IsAuthorized((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID], PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction.View, PwasScope.All))
00028             {
00029                 Response.Redirect("customerView_Home.aspx");
00030             }
00031 
00032 
00033             loadPrintRunList();
00034             loadOrderTable();
00035         }
00036 
00037         private void loadPrintRunList()
00038         {
00039             if (runList.Items.Count == 0)
00040             {
00041                 IPrintRunRepository prRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IPrintRunRepository>();
00042                 List<PrintRun> prList = prRepo.PrintRuns.Where(p => p.run_status == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CREATED).ToList<PrintRun>();
00043 
00044                 ListItem tempItem;
00045 
00046                 foreach (PrintRun pr in prList)
00047                 {
00048                     tempItem = new ListItem("Run " + pr.runID+" - "+pr.run_name, pr.runID.ToString());
00049                     tempItem.Value = pr.runID.ToString();
00050                     runList.Items.Add(tempItem);
00051                 }
00052             }
00053             
00054         }
00055 
00056         private void loadOrderTable()
00057         {
00058             //load active orders and populate tableCreatedOrders
00059             IOrderRepository orderRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00060             List<Order> paidOrders = orderRepo.Orders.Where(o => o.currentStatus == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_PAID).ToList<Order>();
00061             bool canSelect = Security.IsAuthorized((int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID], PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.All);
00062 
00063             foreach (Order order in paidOrders)
00064             {
00065                 TableRow tableRow = new TableRow();
00066                 tableRow.CssClass = "orderRow";
00067 
00068 
00069                 TableCell cellSelect = new TableCell();
00070                 CheckBox check = new CheckBox();
00071                 check.Enabled = canSelect;
00072                 cellSelect.Controls.Add(check);
00073 
00074                 TableCell orderID = new TableCell();
00075                 orderID.Text = order.orderID.ToString();
00076 
00077                 TableCell orderName = new TableCell();
00078                 orderName.Text = order.job_name.ToString();
00079 
00080                 TableCell orderQuantity = new TableCell();
00081                 orderQuantity.Text = order.quantity.ToString();
00082 
00083                 TableCell orderHeight = new TableCell();
00084                 orderHeight.Text = order.height.ToString();
00085 
00086                 TableCell orderWidth = new TableCell();
00087                 orderWidth.Text = order.width.ToString();
00088 
00089                 cellSelect.Width = Unit.Pixel(60);
00090                 orderID.Width = Unit.Pixel(60);
00091                 orderName.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);
00092                 orderQuantity.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00093                 orderHeight.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00094                 orderWidth.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00095 
00096                 tableRow.Cells.Add(cellSelect);
00097                 tableRow.Cells.Add(orderID);
00098                 tableRow.Cells.Add(orderName);
00099                 tableRow.Cells.Add(orderQuantity);
00100                 tableRow.Cells.Add(orderHeight);
00101                 tableRow.Cells.Add(orderWidth);
00102 
00103                 tableCreatedOrders.Rows.Add(tableRow);
00104             }
00105         }
00106 
00107         protected void doSubmit(object sender, EventArgs e)
00108         {
00109             int i = 0;
00110             bool somethingSelected = false;
00111 
00112             List<TableRow> toDelete = new List<TableRow>();
00113             foreach (TableRow row in tableCreatedOrders.Rows)
00114             {
00115                 if (i > 0)//skip the first row, since it's the header row
00116                 {
00117                     TableCell tempCell = row.Cells[0];
00118                     if (((CheckBox)tempCell.Controls[0]).Checked)
00119                     {
00120                         somethingSelected = true;
00121                         IOrderRepository orderRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00122                         orderRepo.UpdateOrderStatus(Int32.Parse(row.Cells[1].Text), OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_PROCESSING);
00123                         orderRepo.UpdateOrderRunId(Int32.Parse(row.Cells[1].Text), Int32.Parse(runList.SelectedValue));
00124                         toDelete.Add(row);
00125                     }
00126                 }
00127 
00128                 i++;
00129             }
00130 
00131             if (somethingSelected)
00132             {
00133                 IPrintRunRepository prRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IPrintRunRepository>();
00134                 prRepo.UpdatePrintRunStatus(Int32.Parse(runList.SelectedValue), OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_PREPRINTING);
00135 
00136                 //1.delete the selected rows from "tableCreatedOrders"
00137                 //2.delete the selected print run from the drop down "runList"
00138 
00139                 foreach (TableRow row in toDelete)
00140                 {
00141                     tableCreatedOrders.Rows.Remove(row);
00142                 }
00143 
00144                 runList.Items.Remove(runList.SelectedItem);
00145 
00146                 messageNotify.Text = "Your orders have been added to the print run successfully.";
00147                 messageNotify.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Green;
00148                 messageNotify.Visible = true;
00149 
00150             }
00151             
00152         }
